title: Nanocrystal 'factory' could revolutionize quantum dot manufacturing

title_detail.value: Nanocrystal 'factory' could revolutionize quantum dot manufacturing

summary: A new system for synthesizing quantum dots across the entire spectrum of visible light drastically reduces manufacturing costs, can be tuned on demand to any color and allows for real-time process monitoring to ensure quality control.

summary_detail.value: A new system for synthesizing quantum dots across the entire spectrum of visible light drastically reduces manufacturing costs, can be tuned on demand to any color and allows for real-time process monitoring to ensure quality control.
